meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed out the osteophyte on the X-ray.
meanings.sent2: The osteophyte on the bone caused discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The tiny osteophyte seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The osteophyte was like a stubborn little bump on the bone.
meanings.sent5: The osteophyte looked like a small, hard bump on the X-ray.

meanings.sent1: She felt the osteophyte when she touched the bone.
meanings.sent2: The osteophyte was a surprising find during the examination.
meanings.sent3: The osteophyte was so small it almost seemed cute.
meanings.sent4: The osteophyte was like a tiny bone pearl.
meanings.sent5: The osteophyte felt like a small, hard nub on the bone.
